Title: Close Payment Form (Successful)
Preconditions: Payment form is open with data entered
Steps:
- Open the payment form.
- Click the "Close" button to close the form
Expected Result:
- Payment form closes.
- Cart remains unchanged.
- Message: “Payment form closed successful
Actual Result: Form closed properly and cart stayed the same

Title: Close Payment Form (Confirmation Required)
Preconditions: Payment form is open with data entered
Steps:
- Open the payment form.
- Click the "Close" button to close the form
Expected Result:
A confirmation message should appear asking the user:
“Are you sure you want to close the payment form?”
If the user clicks "Yes" → the form should close.
If the user clicks "No" → the form should remain open.
Actual Result: The payment form closes immediately without showing any confirmation message, which may cause accidental close
